folder: Richmond Road & Court Place, Staten Island, NY
text:
Richmond Road, south side, between Court Place and St. Patricks Place, showing the old John F. Schwiebert Richmond Wagon Works. Mr. P. L. Sperr states that the brick building was formerly a Dutch Reformed
Church.
June 13, 1927
P. L. Sperr
(2)
A rear view of the brick building, at a later date.
May 6, 1936
P. L. Sperr
(3)
A rear view of the frame building, looking toward
Richmond Road.
May 6, 1936
P. L. Sperr

folder: Richmond Road & Court Place, Staten Island, NY
text:
Richmond Road, at the S.E. corner of Court Place.

June 16, 1935
P.L. Sperr

folder: Richmond Road & Court Place, Staten Island, NY
text:
Richmond Road, south side, between Court Place and St. Patricks Place, showing the rear of the old John F. Schwiebert Wagon Works. Mr. Sperr states that this was formerly a Dutch Reformed Church.

May 6, 1936
P. L. Sperr
